text: Frédéric Lefebvre (; born 14 October 1963 in Neuilly-sur-Seine) is a French politician who was Secretary of State for Trade, Small and Medium Enterprises, Tourism, Services, Liberal professions and Consumption under the Minister of Economy, Finance and Industry, François Baroin. He is a former member of the National Assembly of France. He represented the Hauts-de-Seine department, and was the spokesperson of the Union for a Popular Movement. He was elected MP and representative of the first district of French outside France June 9, 2013. He lost his re-election race in June 2017. He is the founder of l'Ame Nord, a non profit organisation dedicated to serve the interests of French residents living in the US and Canada. He was the UMP's candidate in the for First constituency for French residents overseas (for French expatriates in Canada and the United States) in the 2012 legislative election,"Amérique du Nord : l'UMP désigne Lefebvre" , Le Journal du dimanche, 25 November 2011 but lost against Corinne Narassiguin, who received 54.01% of the votes. On 15 February 2013, the Constitutional Council canceled the election and said Corinne Narassiguin ineligible. He topped the first round of the early parliamentary elections, and after the second round, 9 June 2013, he was elected against the Socialist candidate, Frank Scemama, with 53.72% of the vote. In June 2017, he lost his re-election race against Roland Lescure, the candidate of La République en marche!. Lescure won 80 percent of the vote, to Lefebvre's 20 percent. He was a candidate in the 2016 Republican presidential primary.http://www.france24.com/en/20160215-france-les-republicains- presidential-primary-cope-sarkozy-juppe ==References== ==External links== * His official site * * http://frenchmorning.com/ny/2013/06/09/heureux-frederic- lefebvre-est-satisfait-de-la-participation/ Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:People from Neuilly-sur-Seine Category:Politicians from Île-de-France Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Agir (France) politicians Category:Secretaries of State of France Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:La République En Marche! politicians Category:French lawyers
title: Frédéric Lefebvre
